overview.narrative: We are stabilizing the digital commerce engine so that every channel tells a cohesive Wynwood Walls story, trades on the parent site's authority, and converts with measurement we can trust.
guidingPrinciples: Fix measurement and feed hygiene before scaling spend
Tell the artist and wearable-art story in every touchpoint
Run channel plays in parallel with clear owners and feedback loops
Design for multi-site synergy: the museum drives the shop, the shop monetizes the museum
guardrails: No paid spend expansion without verified purchase tracking
Protect artist inventory visibility across channels
Maintain merchandise availability accuracy across Merchant Center, marketplaces, and the shop
Keep Alejandro focused 80% on revenue levers with support for operational tasks

objectives: Revenue acceleration for holidays while fixing measurement and feed hygiene
Expand reach via marketplaces (Etsy, Amazon, eBay) using automated product feeds
Leverage parent brand and site to route qualified traffic with systematic UTMs
Position fashion as wearable art with brand storytelling and content capture
Build persistent social and email communities that convert at benchmark rates

sections.title: Platform & Insight Overview
sections.description: Lay the operational foundation: accurate data, stable feeds, and stakeholder alignment on revenue priorities.
focusPoints: Repair Google Ads conversion tracking and GA4 attribution
Sync Merchant Center inventory and pricing across all feeds
Stand up reporting cadence that exposes channel health weekly
Document SOPs so marketing can work 90 days ahead of product launches

plays.title: Stabilize Measurement & Merchant Center
objectives: Correct Google Ads conversion actions and dynamic values
Eliminate out-of-stock SKUs from paid inventory feeds
tasks: Audit all primary conversion actions and restrict "Purchase" as the only primary
Push fixed GTM container and validate purchase events end-to-end
Deploy feed management app to rewrite titles with artist + product descriptors
Add monitoring alerts for availability mismatches
dependencies: Access to Google Ads, GA4, Merchant Center

plays.title: Growth Program War-Room
objectives: Create shared roadmap working 90 days ahead
Run weekly parallel standups for measurement, merchandising, and creative
tasks: Launch Clickup.com space with swim lanes per channel
Institute weekly speed-dating sync between marketing, merchandising, creative and ecom ops
Publish KPI scorecard in Clickup each Friday
successSignals: Launch SOP executed on next drop

enablement.title: Analytics Enablement
enablement.description: Give the team shared visibility into truth-of-revenue metrics.
items: GA4 dashboard segmented by source/medium + artist collections
Template for campaign tagging across Google, Meta, TikTok, Pinterest
Looker Studio executive view for leadership

experiments.title: Checkout CRO Sprint
experiments.hypothesis: Introducing bundled upsells in checkout will lift AOV by 8%

sections.title: Social & Community Flywheel
sections.description: Scale storytelling and wearable-art positioning across Instagram, TikTok, YouTube, and live shopping.
focusPoints: Shift social calendar toward storytelling, live formats, and UGC
Run TikTok Live Shopping pilots featuring exclusive drops
Activate influencers and Miami micro-creators with measurable UTMs
Reuse museum content to warm audiences before campaigns

positioning.title: Positioning & Content Pillars
positioning.description: Become the online authority on street art with recurring editorial + video pillars.
pillars: Artist Spotlights: Mini-docs, interviews, studio access
Behind-the-Walls: Process videos, production cycles, collaboration stories
Education: Art movements, techniques, cultural context
Wearable Art Styling: Lookbooks, outfit inspiration, lifestyle content
positioning.action: Drive internal links from main site artist pages to matching shop products.

platforms.name: Instagram
platforms.shift: From mostly promos to engagement formats
tactics: Stories: Daily with polls, Q&As, behind-the-scenes
Lives: Scheduled artist chats, Q&A sessions

platforms.name: TikTok
tactics: TikTok Live Shopping for apparel capsules with artists
Duets and stitches with creator content

platforms.name: YouTube
tactics: Mini-docs: Artist interviews, studio tours (8–15 min)
Process videos: Collaboration timelines, design evolution
Reuse as Shorts for top-of-funnel discovery

platforms.name: Pinterest
tactics: Gift guides: Holiday, home decor, lifestyle
Pins link to blog posts and product pages

platforms.name: Facebook
tactics: Longer video posts and community updates

creators.title: Creators & Affiliate Program
creators.description: Stand up a lightweight influencer/affiliate program tied to limited drops and wear-tests.
focus: Art/fashion/lifestyle creators in Miami and beyond
Trackable promo codes for each creator
Revenue share or flat fee per conversion

dropOperatingSystem.title: Product-Drop Operating System (90-Day Hype SOP)
dropOperatingSystem.description: A concrete playbook for every collaboration/apparel drop to build anticipation and drive sales.

actions: Announce collab theme and artist story
Collect "notify me first" emails via IG/TikTok/YT links
First lookbook Reel with styling tips
Creator unboxing and styling posts go live
Reveal launch date and open limited pre-orders
Schedule IG Live + TikTok Live with artist
Email list gets exclusive early-access link
Daily Shorts/Reels with product close-ups and styling
Live Shopping on IG and TikTok
Post-launch lookbook carousel and styling guide

tasks: Fix Facebook page accessibility; audit current config
Set weekly content cadences per platform (e.g., IG: 3 Reels + 5 Stories/wk)
Book 4 artist/creator tapings for Reels/Shorts/long-form content
Launch #WearableArt UGC prompt across all platforms
Publish 2x/week Stories with polls and Q&As
Identify one Q4 drop; start T-90 warm-up (compress if window is shorter)
Roll out TikTok Live test + IG Live artist chat (1x/week)
Push first lookbook Reel; track views and saves
Activate 5 micro-creators with trackable promo codes
Publish 2× YouTube pieces (artist mini-doc + process video)
Clip YouTube into Shorts for top-of-funnel reach
Monitor engagement rate and UGC volume daily
T-30 pre-order phase for next drop; daily Shorts/Reels
Creator recap carousel; tag and celebrate top UGC
Evaluate: keep what hits; cut what doesn't
Schedule next capsule on same 90-day rail
Measure assisted revenue from social (with correct UTM tracking)
Report on drop waitlist sign-ups and Live Shopping conversion

kpis.title: KPIs to Watch Monthly
metrics: Engagement rate per platform (IG, TikTok, YouTube, Pinterest)
Assisted revenue from social (GA4 + CRM attribution)
Drop waitlist sign-ups and email capture rate
Live Shopping conversion rate and AOV
Creator program ROI (revenue per creator code)

plays.title: 4-Channel Weekly Drumbeat
objectives: Publish minimum 5 Reels/TikToks weekly highlighting artists and product context
Cross-post museum Instagram content with shop-specific CTAs
tasks: Build Notion-based content calendar with required CTAs
Publish TikTok Live shopping plan with artists twice per month
Launch hashtag program (#WearableArt, #WynwoodDrop)

plays.title: Influencer Capsule
objectives: Seed wearable-art looks with 10 Miami creators
Capture UGC for ads
tasks: Identify creators aligned to art/fashion niches
Ship lookbook + talking points
Track UGC via specific UTMs

experiments.title: YouTube Artist Mini-Docs
experiments.hypothesis: 5-minute artist profiles embedded on museum pages will raise click-through to the shop by 15%

sections.title: SEO & Content Engine
sections.description: Use thewynwoodwalls.com authority and storytelling to fill the top of funnel and pass demand to the shop.
focusPoints: Create deep artist spotlight pages with commerce hooks
Build resource center for street art education and buyer guides
Connect museum and shop sites with reciprocal internal links
Improve site architecture with advanced filters and schema

plays.title: Artist & Collection Hub Refresh
objectives: Map top-performing museum pages to relevant shop collections
Launch enhanced artist bios with embedded product modules
tasks: Conduct keyword research for top artist names + "shop" intent
Add schema markup for products and events
Implement new cross-link blocks on 10 priority pages
successSignals: 15% lift in referral sessions from museum site
Top 10 artist pages include commerce module

plays.title: Seasonal Content Sprint
objectives: Publish gift guides and wearable-art editorials tied to campaigns
tasks: Outline 6-8 gift guides
Publish blog + email hook
Add Pinterest-ready imagery

enablement.title: Content Governance
enablement.description: Ensure each article drives to collections and email capture.
items: Inventory alignment sheet for featured products

experiments.title: Interactive Mural Map
experiments.hypothesis: Embedding an interactive mural map with shop CTAs will increase average session duration by 30%

sections.title: Marketplace Expansion
sections.description: Activate Etsy, Amazon, and eBay as incremental revenue streams without cannibalizing the core store.
focusPoints: Launch curated assortments with automated feed syncing
Standardize pricing, hero copy, and review collection
Build daily exception monitoring for inventory drift
Create cross-channel promotion loop back to owned site

plays.title: Listing Launch Wave
objectives: List All Active SKUs across channels
Hit $5-15K GMV target in first 90 days
tasks: Align data feed attributes for each marketplace
Enable Amazon review request automation
Craft Etsy storefront narrative featuring artists

plays.title: Marketplace Promotion Loop
objectives: Drive marketplace shoppers back to owned channels
tasks: Include insert cards with QR linking to shop exclusives
Run targeted remarketing audiences for purchasers
successSignals: 25% of marketplace buyers join email list

enablement.title: Operational Backbone
enablement.description: Keep catalog synchronized across all properties.

sections.title: Performance Marketing Lab
sections.description: Rebuild paid media with disciplined testing, rapid scaling, and channel diversification (Meta, Google, TikTok, YouTube).
focusPoints: Operate test > learn > scale loops weekly
Stand up TikTok + YouTube prospecting while remarketing via Meta/Google
Use UGC and live shopping assets as creative inputs
Tie spend decisions to verified profit per artist/collection

plays.title: Testing Matrix
objectives: Evaluate 3 new creatives and 2 audiences per week
Reveal winning combinations within 72 hours
tasks: Build decision doc for creative testing
Launch YouTube & Shorts campaigns targeting art & culture enthusiasts
Apply negative keywords to trim wasted Google spend

plays.title: Offer Ladder Deployment
objectives: Coordinate offers across email, paid social, and marketplaces
tasks: Publish discount matrix by audience tier
Sync creative variants across channels
Monitor ROAS daily and rebalance budget

enablement.title: Media Lab Toolkit
enablement.description: Documentation and automations to support scale.

experiments.title: YouTube Shorts Prospecting
experiments.hypothesis: YouTube Shorts with artist-focused content will yield <$40 CAC targeting art enthusiasts and collectors
steps: Launch small pilot with 5-10 Shorts creatives
Review CPV and CAC after 7 days
Scale winners or pivot creative approach

sections.title: Fashion Brand Building
sections.description: Elevate wearable art as a premium line with storytelling, wholesale pilots, and experiential activations.
focusPoints: Develop cohesive brand identity and lookbook
Create hype-driven launch cadence with 90-day runway
Secure wholesale and pop-up placements
Translate physical experiences to digital drops

plays.title: Brand Framework Sprint
objectives: Define positioning, voice, and capsule roadmap
tasks: Produce wearable art manifesto
Design lookbook + campaign visuals
Draft pitch deck for wholesale conversations

plays.title: Launch SOP Execution
objectives: Run hype, pre-order, launch, and sustain phases for each drop
tasks: 60-day tease campaign with artist interviews
30-day pre-order window with limited units
Launch-day live shopping show and remarketing

enablement.title: Experience Extension
enablement.description: Bridge physical Wynwood Walls experiences with digital commerce.
items: QR codes at murals linking to product stories
Artist residency calendar feeding product pipeline

experiments.title: Augmented Reality Try-On
experiments.hypothesis: Allowing shoppers to visualize wearable art via AR will boost conversion by 5%

cadence.focus: Measurement repair, narrative alignment, and first content surge
Channel activation across social, SEO, and marketplaces
parallelStreams: SEO squad deploys artist hubs + gift guides

cadence.focus: Fashion capsule launches, experiential partnerships, community expansion
parallelStreams: Influencer/PR team books collaborations and pop-ups
Lifecycle team scales automation and retention offers
